rows.label: qst502015_msg0001
rows.name: What seems to be the problem here?

rows.label: qst502015_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, it's this pond. It's got an
infestation of nasty bugs.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0003
rows.name:
I want to get rid of them to protect the
fish living here, but some of the fish are
pretty small, so I can't use insecticides.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0004
rows.name:
If someone could pass a delicate flow
of lightning energy through the water,
I thought that might get rid of them.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0005
rows.name:
But there aren't many people
who can...

rows.label: qst502015_msg0006
rows.name: Um, actually you look pretty lightningy.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0008
rows.name:
Do you think you could manage it?
Getting rid of just the nasty bugs,
while leaving the fish unharmed?

rows.label: qst502015_msg0009
rows.name:
Well, I'm not really used to that
kind of delicate control...

rows.label: qst502015_msg0010
rows.name:
I might end up giving the fish
a nasty shock as well.

rows.label: qst502015_msg0011
rows.name:
Don't be like that.
Give it a try, at least!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0012
rows.name: Ohhhh... All right, I'll see what I can do!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0013
rows.name: You see? I knew you could do it!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0014
rows.name:
Now this pond will be safe and healthy!
The fish look happier already!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0015
rows.name: I'm glad I could be of help!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0017
rows.name:
You really are a star.
Thanks so much!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0024
rows.name:
Ahhhh, it's no good!
I can't do this!

rows.label: qst502015_msg0025
rows.name:
I just know we'll end up with a lake
covered in fried fish, belly up!
